title: Note : The number of persons for Sr
clause_text: Note : The number of persons for Sr.No.(10) to (13) shall be determined by the average number of passengers, handled by the station daily; due consideration may be given to the staff and workers likely to use the facilities.
section: 12.5 WATER SUPPLY, DRAINAGE AND SANITARY REQUIREMENTS
